name: Emmanuel Migeot
background: Emmanuel Migeot serves as Commissioning Editor, France 2 at France Télévisions, focusing on premium documentary and specialist factual content that reflects French culture and society.
thematic_priorities: High-impact prime-time documentaries for prestige slots
Contemporary social issues with compelling narratives
Premium documentary programming with strong cultural relevance
Regional documentary programming celebrating French cultural diversity
Science documentaries balancing intellectual rigor with accessibility
Cultural documentaries exploring French and global arts
target_audience: Broad French audiences across France Télévisions family of channels
budget_parameters: Documentary: €150K–€350K per hour; Specialist Factual: €180K–€400K per hour
current_calls: Reflect latest broadcaster priorities as outlined above.
submission_process: Two-page treatment with premise, approach, and narrative structure
Details of secured or potential access
Key talent and production team credentials
additional_info: Ongoing submissions accepted year-round. Emphasis on diverse voices on- and off-screen. Encouragement of sustainable production practices.
